import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import Products from "../components/Products"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const Product = Products.find((P) => P._id === match.params.id); return (
{" "} Previous Page{" "}

{Product.name}

 {" "} Price: ${Product.price} Description: {Product.description} price ${Product.price} Status {Product.countInStock > 0 ? "in stock" : "out of stock"}
); }; export default ProductScreen;
